step.cmd: Unplug the appliance and make sure that it is completely turned off.
Remove the freezer bowl, mixing arm, and easy-lock lid.
Wash each part by hand with warm soapy water. These parts do not belong in a dishwasher because they may become seriously damaged.
Clean the base with a damp cloth.
Put the freezer bowl back in the freezer in the Shanks Hall 3rd floor break room (Room 380).
Store the appliance and remianing parts in a responsible location that is room-temperature and has no exposure to water. Ensure that the appliance is no longer turned on or plugged in.
